bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description:
With GBS, I'm seeing some critical warning messages: <denchmark-code>[ 29s] + ./unittest_sink --gst-plugin-path=./gst [ 29s] [ 29s] (gst-plugin-scanner:23073): GStreamer-WARNING **: Failed to load plugin './gst/tensor_filter/libtensor_filter.so': libtensor_filter_tflitecore.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory [ 29s] [==========] Running 8 tests from 1 test case. [ 29s] [----------] Global test environment set-up. [ 29s] [----------] 8 tests from tensor_sink_test [ 29s] [ RUN ] tensor_sink_test.properties [ 29s] [ OK ] tensor_sink_test.properties (2 ms) [ 29s] [ RUN ] tensor_sink_test.signals [ 29s] [ OK ] tensor_sink_test.signals (335 ms) [ 29s] [ RUN ] tensor_sink_test.signal_rate [ 29s] [ OK ] tensor_sink_test.signal_rate (337 ms) [ 29s] [ RUN ] tensor_sink_test.unknown_case [ 29s] [ 29s] (unittest_sink:23072): GLib-GObject-WARNING **: g_object_set_valist: object class 'GstTensorSink' has no property named 'unknown-prop' [ 29s] [ 29s] (unittest_sink:23072): GLib-GObject-WARNING **: g_object_get_valist: object class 'GstTensorSink' has no property named 'unknown-prop' [ 29s] [ 29s] (unittest_sink:23072): GLib-GObject-WARNING **: gsignal.c:2523: signal 'unknown-sig' is invalid for instance '0x1ca3be0' of type 'GstTensorSink' [ 30s] [ OK ] tensor_sink_test.unknown_case (169 ms) [ 30s] [ RUN ] tensor_sink_test.caps_error [ 30s] [ OK ] tensor_sink_test.caps_error (9 ms) [ 30s] [ RUN ] tensor_sink_test.caps_tensors [ 30s] [ OK ] tensor_sink_test.caps_tensors (2 ms) [ 30s] [ RUN ] tensor_sink_test.audio_stream [ 30s] [ OK ] tensor_sink_test.audio_stream (642 ms) [ 30s] [ RUN ] tensor_sink_test.text_stream [ 30s] [ OK ] tensor_sink_test.text_stream (204 ms) [ 30s] [----------] 8 tests from tensor_sink_test (1700 ms total) [ 30s] [ 30s] [----------] Global test environment tear-down [ 30s] [==========] 8 tests from 1 test case ran. (1700 ms total) [ 30s] [ PASSED ] 8 tests. [ 30s] + popd
</denchmark-code>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/485>#485</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
In my opinion, this is unnecessary testcase. I will remove this testcase.

Actually, this part, <denchmark-code>[ 29s] (gst-plugin-scanner:23073): GStreamer-WARNING **: Failed to load plugin './gst/tensor_filter/libtensor_filter.so': libtensor_filter_tflitecore.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory </denchmark-code>
looks especially dangerous.

PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/pull/493>#493</denchmark-link> (refactoring tensor-converter with gst-adapter) added testcases for text, audio, and aggregator. removed (testcase for unknown property and signal in tensor-sink)

PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/pull/514>#514</denchmark-link> (set ld_lib_path before starting unittest) fixed warning message libtensor_filter_tflitecore.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
